column2: has someone you know sent you advice from an unknown expert against coronavirus watch out the expert may not be an authentic one one way to manipulate information is through the use of a false expert who can add more credibility to the message always verify who that expert is and which organization they represent during the covid-19 outbreak only trust official information sources and credible media Outlets do not share on verified information this is a message from UNESCO
find the message I want to find the man shooting at 9:30 p.m. tonight
